text.div:
This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://snomed.info/sct version 2021
    CodeDisplay
    401286005Borg Breathlessness Score: 6 severe (+) (finding)
    397702004Borg Breathlessness Score finding (finding)
    39950000Dyspnea, class III (finding)
    401275008Borg Breathlessness Score: 0 none at all (finding)
    23141003Gasping for breath (finding)
    73322006Dyspnea, class IV (finding)
    161941007Dyspnea at rest (finding)
    20112008Dyspnea leaning over (finding)
    102577000Trepopnea (finding)
    34560001Expiratory dyspnea (finding)
    390871002Breathless - strenuous exertion (finding)
    267036007Dyspnea (finding)
    17216000Dyspnea, class I (finding)
    55442000Paroxysmal nocturnal dyspnea (finding)
    407588003Unable to complete a sentence in one breath (finding)
    870535009Chronic dyspnea (finding)
    25209001Inspiratory dyspnea (finding)
    401292004Borg Breathlessness Score: 9 very, very severe (almost maximal) (finding)
    391124000Medical Research Council Dyspnoea scale grade 3 (finding)
    401281000Borg Breathlessness Score: 3 moderate (finding)
    72365000Dyspnea, class II (finding)
    390870001Short of breath dressing/undressing (finding)
    391125004Medical Research Council Dyspnoea scale grade 4 (finding)
    60845006Dyspnea on exertion (finding)
    24921003Dyspnea raising arms (finding)
    391120009Medical Research Council Dyspnoea scale grade 1 (finding)
    297216006Increasing breathlessness (finding)
    401291006Borg Breathlessness Score: 8 very severe (+) (finding)
    30744009Platypnea (finding)
    59265000Paroxysmal dyspnea (finding)
    161939006Breathless - moderate exertion (finding)
    401293009Borg Breathlessness Score: 10 maximal (finding)
    401282007Borg Breathlessness Score: 4 somewhat severe (finding)
    401280004Borg Breathlessness Score: 2 slight (finding)
    161940008Breathless - mild exertion (finding)
    119981000146107Dyspnea caused by Severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (disorder)
    248548009Nocturnal dyspnea (finding)
    391123006Medical Research Council Dyspnoea scale grade 2 (finding)
    422177004Dyspnea associated with acquired immunodeficiency syndrome (disorder)
    401323002Borg Breathlessness Score: 0.5 very, very slight (just noticeable) (finding)
    57769004Dyspnea after eating (finding)
    62744007Orthopnea (finding)
    401290007Borg Breathlessness Score: 7 very severe (finding)
    391126003Medical Research Council Dyspnoea scale grade 5 (finding)
    401284008Borg Breathlessness Score: 5 severe (finding)
    401279002Borg Breathlessness Score: 1 very slight (finding)
  • Include these codes as defined in http://hl7.org/fhir/sid/icd-10-cm version 2022
    CodeDisplay
    R06.02Shortness of breath
    R06.01Orthopnea
    R06.0Dyspnea
    R06.00Dyspnea, unspecified
    R06.03Acute respiratory distress
    R06.09Other forms of dyspnea
